titlesection: OnePlay Cloud Platform | India's first Open Source Decentralized Cloud Gaming Platform

heading1: High Strung Gaming At Affordable Prices
subheading1: * Get 5 hours of gameplay, after approval from backend.
question1: How much does the OnePlay subscription cost?
asnquestion1: OnePlay is a subscription service. We offer you three amazing subscription plans that will fit all your needs. We have a Hourly plan for Rs. 35, Weekly plan for Rs. 150 and Monthly plan for Rs. 300. The higher the plan you choose, the more games you have access to. You will also gain more features such as HD quality and 4K streaming.
asnquestion1-1: You can pay via Debit Card, Credit Card or UPI.
asnquestion1-2: Once subscribed you can cancel your subscription at any point.
asnquestion2: OnePlay does not provide store credentials like Steam/Epic/Ubisoft/Origin/battle.net. It is suggested that you have an existing account with these administrations, with whichever game you want to play before you login to our platform.
question3: Does OnePlay have access to my credentials?
asnquestion3: OnePlay does not store your credentials on their servers. Each session is purged after your use. Only your Login ID is temporarily stored as a cache.
question4: How do I claim my refund?
ansquestion4-2: given here to read our refund and cancellation policy. No refunds are provided for any hourly or weekly plans.
question5: How can I cancel my subscription?
ansquestion5: Please ensure you do not renew your plan before your subscription period ends. The plan will be cancelled automatically after the billed date.
